description: Provides a list of batch load tasks, along with the name, status, when the task is resumable until, and other details. See code sample for details.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token to specify where to start paginating. Provide the next ListBatchLoadTasksRequest.

nested_items.name: BatchLoadTasks
nested_items.description: A list of batch load task details.

nested_items.name: TaskId
nested_items.description: The ID of the batch load task.

nested_items.name: TaskStatus
nested_items.description: Status of the batch load task.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: Database name for the database into which a batch load task loads data.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: Table name for the table into which a batch load task loads data.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the Timestream batch load task was created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The time when the Timestream batch load task was last updated.
